= Pascal Module Compiler (PMC) =

What PMC does is to compile directly a free-pascal unit file to a lysee module.

By the time, PMC is packed in _*lysee_pmc*_, a standalone console program.

== 1. Usage ==

|| *usage* || *description ||
|| lysee_pmc pasunit.pas || generate _*pasunit_m.pas, wraping pasunit.pas as a lysee module ||
|| lysee_pmc -opasunit.dll pasunit.pas || compile pasunit.pas to lysee module pasunit.dll ||
